Name: Astral Domine
About the game: After crash landing on a mysterious planet, you must explore the ruins of an ancient alien kingdom to retrieve the energy sphere that can restore power to your spaceship. A single player interactive VR adventure designed for the HTC Vive. REQUIRES VIVE HEADSET AND MOTION CONTROLLERS TO PLAY
